billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Creates the New York city transit authority safety advisory panel to study and report on safety from terrorist acts
summary: Creates the New York city transit authority safety advisory panel to study and report on safety from terrorist acts and to provide a moratorium on the closing of token booths and minimum staffing levels on trains operated in passenger service in the NYC transit system.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to creating a New York city transit authority safety advisory panel to study and report on safety from terrorist acts and to provide for a moratorium on the closing of token booths and minimum staffing levels on trains operated in passenger service in the New York city transit system
